game.l_dis:
Subway Surfers: Venice â€“ Ride the Venice Beach Boardwalk

Subway Surfers: Venice brings endless runner action to the sunny, iconic Venice Beach. Dash, jump, and dodge through boardwalks, canals, and piers while unlocking new characters and boards.

What is Subway Surfers: Venice?

This edition of Subway Surfers is set on Venice Beach, Los Angeles. Players enjoy new visuals, a Venice-themed environment, and special content like the character Phoenix and the Beach Pop hoverboard.

How to Play Subway Surfers: Venice?

  • Swipe Controls: Swipe up to jump, down to roll, left/right to switch lanes.
  • Collect Coins: Gather coins to unlock Venice-themed characters and hoverboards.
  • Dodge Obstacles: Avoid trains, barriers, and Venice-specific hazards.
  • Use Power-Ups: Utilize magnets, jetpacks, and boards to boost your run.

Why Play Subway Surfers: Venice Unblocked?

Experience the Venice Beach-themed world of Subway Surfers online anytime without restrictions, exploring unique visuals, characters, and boards.

Key Features

  • Venice Beach Setting: Iconic piers, canals, and boardwalk visuals.
  • New Characters & Boards: Unlock the character Phoenix and the Beach Pop hoverboard.
  • Endless Runner Gameplay: Classic swipe-to-run mechanics in a new environment.
  • Power-Ups & Coins: Collect boosts and coins to unlock rewards and enhance gameplay.
  • Unblocked Online: Play directly in your browser without restrictions.

Master Venice Beach!

Run, jump, and slide through Subway Surfers: Venice and conquer the boardwalk in a fast-paced, endless runner adventure!
